Momentary Speed

v=dxdtv=\frac{dx}{dt}v=dtdx​

Momentary Acceleration

a=dvdt=d2xdt2a=\frac{dv}{dt}=\frac{d^2x}{dt^2}a=dtdv​=dt2d2x​

Momentum

p=m⋅v\bf{p} = m \cdot \bf{v}p=m⋅v

Force

F=dpdt=m⋅a\textbf{F} = \frac{d\bf{p}}{dt} = m \cdot \bf{a}F=dtdp​=m⋅a

Gravitation

F=C⋅m1⋅m2r2F = C \cdot \frac{m_1 \cdot m_2}{r^2}F=C⋅r2m1​⋅m2​​

Centripetal Acceleration

ac=v2r=rω2a_c = \frac{v^2}{r} = r \omega^2ac​=rv2​=rω2

Work

W=∫x1x2F(x) dxW = \int_{x_1}^{x_2} F(x) \,dxW=∫x1​x2​​F(x)dx

Kenetic Energy

K=m⋅v22K = \frac{m \cdot v^2}{2}K=2m⋅v2​

Potential Energy

W=−ΔU, F=−dUdxW = -\Delta U, \, F = -\frac{dU}{dx}W=−ΔU,F=−dxdU​

Reduced Mass

1μ=1m+1M\frac{1}{\mu} = \frac{1}{m} + \frac{1}{M}μ1​=m1​+M1​

Angular Frequency

ω=2πf=2πT\omega = 2\pi f = \frac{2\pi}{T}ω=2πf=T2π​
